scripts.clean: yarn clean:rn && yarn clean:ios && yarn clean:android && yarn start --reset-cache
scripts.clean:rn: watchman watch-del-all && npx del-cli node_modules && yarn && npx del-cli /tmp/metro-*
scripts.clean:android: cd android && npx del-cli build app/build
scripts.clean:ios: cd ios && npx del-cli Pods Podfile.lock build && pod deintegrate && pod install
scripts.build:ios: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace SodiumReactNativeExample.xcworkspace -scheme SodiumReactNativeExample -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator CC=clang CPLUSPLUS=clang++ LD=clang LDPLUSPLUS=clang++ GCC_OPTIMIZATION_LEVEL=0 GCC_PRECOMPILE_PREFIX_HEADER=YES ASSETCATALOG_COMPILER_OPTIMIZATION=time DEBUG_INFORMATION_FORMAT=dwarf COMPILER_INDEX_STORE_ENABLE=NO
